We're in the final few days of Fanatical's Bundlefest Spring 2025 event, but there are still some great new bundles on the way. Today's new bundle deal is the VIP Mystery Bundle - Ultimate Edition, which includes at least five acclaimed Steam games for just $8. The previous bundles launched so far include the Spring Superstars Collection May 2025 edition, Pedal to the Metal Supercharged Bundle, the Build Your Own Bento Bundle, the Slitherine Strategy Bundle, and the Killer Bundle Spring 2025 Edition. You'll find full details on all the Bundlefest Spring 2025 bundles below. The event runs until Friday, May 16, and there are still two more new bundles left before the event closes out, so be sure to check back tomorrow to see the next deal.

Fanatical's Bundlefest Spring 2025 at a glance

  • Wednesday, May 7: Killer Bundle (Bundlefest Spring 2025)
  • Thursday, May 8: Slitherine Strategy Bundle
  • Friday, May 9: Build Your Own Bento Bundle (Spring 2025)
  • Monday, May 12: Build Your Own Pedal to the Metal Bundle - Supercharged
  • Tuesday, May 13: Build your own Spring Superstars Collection (May 2025)
  • Wednesday, May 14: VIP Mystery Bundle - Ultimate Edition
  • Thursday, May 15: TBA
  • Friday, May 16: TBA

It's worth noting that while Bundlefest Spring 2025 only lasts through Friday, May 16, the new bundles launched during the event will be available for several more weeks after. We've made sure to list when each bundle deal expires below.

Disclosure: GameSpot and Fanatical are both owned by Fandom.

Fanatical's Bundlefest Spring 2025

VIP Mystery Bundle - Ultimate Edition

Fanatical's VIP Mystery Bundle - Ultimate Edition includes at least five acclaimed PC titles for just $8. Each bundle includes a randomized selection of games from Fanatical's catelog, and while we don't know which titles are on offer, the bundle's Fanatical store page says every title is "rated Overwhelmingly Positive or Very Positive with over 3,000 reviews on Steam, or is a well-received release from the past 12 months," and each bundle includes at least one game rated Overwhelmingly Positive or Very Positive on Steam with at least 15,000 reviews. So chances are you'll come out of this with a few bangers. And if you're really lucky, there's a chance one of the five keys in the bundle could be a premium AAA game like Doom: The Dark Ages Premium Edition, Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remastered, The Last of Us Part II Remastered, or Kingdom Come Deliverance II Gold.

Build your own Spring Superstars Collection (May 2025)

Fanatical's Bundlefest Spring 2025 deal for Tuesday, May 13, is the new May 2025 edition of the Build Your Own Spring Superstars Collection. This bundle includes some of the most popular sellers from Fanatical's catalogue, including big profile titles like Skyrim Special Edition and Deathloop, and fan-favorite indies like Backpack Hero and Laika: Aged Through Blood, and overlooked gems like RoboCop: Rogue City. This is another bundle with scaling pricing. It starts at two games for $15 ($7.50 per game), but if you pick three or more games, the price per key drops to $7.25, and at five or more games, you'll pay just $7 per title. There's no cap on how many you can pick, and if you want all 17 games, you'll pay $119. That makes the full bundle it the most expensive deal launched so far, but considering you're getting $491 worth of games, that's a solid deal.

Build Your Own Pedal to the Metal Bundle - Supercharged

The Build Your Own Pedal to the Metal Bundle - Supercharged deal offers up to 20 racing games, several of which are multi-game packs like the Nintendo Kart Racers 2 & 3 Super Turbo Triple Pack that includesNickelodeon Kart Racers 2: Grand Prix, Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway, and Nickelodeon Kart Racers 3: Slime Speedway Turbo Pack. There's also the Redout Complete Bundle that includes Redout: Enhanced Edition and seven premium DLC packs in one collection. There are many more games available for the Build Your Own Pedal to the Metal Bundle. Check the list below to see them all.

Like other Fanatical Build Your Own Bundle promos, pricing depends on how many games you purchase. The deal starts at three games for $13.50 ($4.50 per game), but at five or more games, you pay just $4 per game. There's no limit to how many you can add, and if you pick up the full 20-game lineup, you'll pay just $80.

Build Your Own Bento Bundle (Spring 2025)

The Spring 2025 edition of the Build Your Own Bento Bundle lets you pick from a list of 19 anime-themed PC games. A few noteworthy picks include three Harvest Moon games--Light of Hope Special Edition, One World, and The Winds of Anthos--the stylish 3D space combat sim Rogue Flight and the side-scrolling action game Spirit of the Samurai.

Pricing starts at three games for $10 ($3.33 per key), but if you pick at least five games the price drops to $3 per game, and at seven or more games you'll pay just $2.85 per key. The full 19-game bundle costs $54.15, which is a big cut from the $335.81 you'd spend buying each game separately. The Build Your Own Bento Bundle (Spring 2025) will be available until June 13.

Slitherine Strategy Bundle

The second Bundlefest Spring 2025 bundle is the Slitherine Strategy Bundle, which includes up to 10 games from publisher Slitherine. The full 10-game bundle costs $15 (normally a $400 value), but two smaller tiers are also available if you don't want to pay as much. Some notable games in the bundle include Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War, Stargate: Timekeepers, and Battlestar Galactica Deadlock. You'll find all the games available in the bundle listed below.

The Slitherine Strategy Bundle will be available until June 5.

Killer Bundle (Bundlefest Spring 2025) - 5 Games for $5

This new edition of Fanatical's recurring Killer Bundle gets you five roguelike action games for just $5. The titles included are the wave-based FPS brawler Paint the Town Red, top-down survival shooter Empty Shell, medieval survivors-like Army of Ruin, the Hades-inspired deck-building dungeon crawler Dandy Ace, and the sci-fi tower defense game DG2: Defense Grid. That tallies up to a $75 value for all five games, meaning you're saving $70 thanks to this $5 bundle deal. All five games in the bundle are delivered as official Steam keys, and each is Steam Deck verified.

The Killer Bundle (Bundlefest Spring 2025) will be available until June 11.
